SG_Tree * MakeTree ()

Detailed Description

SG_TreeFactory generates an SG_Tree from a list of SG_Nodes. It joins pairs of SG_Nodes to minimise the size of the resultant bounding box. cf building an optimized Huffman tree.

Warning:
O(n^3)!!!
